channel.title: Help With Making Own Server?
channel.description:
[b]i have a few bullet points i need help with?[/b]
[ul][li]i would like a server file(e.g blackscape) that is just normal runescape and i can edit myself,and has to be the latest one[/li] [li]i would also like a tutorial on how to setup a private server and put it online so other people can play without hamachi just no-ip[/li] [li]and also a tutorial on making my own client and uploading it onto a webpage[/li][/ul]
i would apprecitre any help on these points plz :)

item.title: Help With Making Own Server?

i have a few bullet points i need help with?
